No internet connection Limited features available
This site is blocked to help you stay focused and avoid distractions.
You can manage blocked sites in Settings > Website blocking
How do I set time limits for apps?
Go to Settings > Features > Digital Wellbeing > App limits. There you can select the apps you want to limit and set a maximum daily time.
Minimal Mode turns your phone into a basic tool by hiding distracting apps and showing only essentials. You can choose which apps appear in Settings > Manage apps.
This feature lets you block specific content inside apps (like Reels in Instagram or Shorts in YouTube) without blocking the whole app. It requires enabling the accessibility service.
How do I protect my settings with a password?
Go to Settings > Features > Security and Privacy > Password Protection. Set a numeric PIN to protect your settings and prevent disabling limits.
Why does the app need Accessibility permission?
Accessibility permission is required to detect and block specific content inside apps (like Reels or Shorts) and to block websites. Without it, those features cannot work.
Why does the app need Usage Access permission?
This permission allows Momentum to monitor your app usage to show accurate statistics and enforce the time limits you set.
How does ‚ÄúMy life in weeks‚Äù work?
This visualization shows your life divided into weeks, from your birth to an average life expectancy. It helps you reflect on time and make more conscious choices about how you use it.
How do I set up widgets?
Long-press your home screen, select ‚ÄúWidgets‚Äù, search for ‚ÄúMomentum‚Äù, and drag the widget you want to your screen. You can adjust colors in Settings > Widget settings.
Do my data sync across devices?
Yes. If you‚Äôre signed in, your settings and data sync automatically in the cloud. You can check sync status in Settings > Sync.
How do I temporarily disable limits?
If password protection is enabled, you must enter your PIN to disable limits. This is intentional to prevent impulsive disabling.
Long-press the home screen to add widgets
